alert.note: Alert for Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 05 at 4:28PM AST until February 05 at 7:30PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Vega Baja Municipality in Puerto Rico... Vega Alta Municipality in Puerto Rico... Dorado Municipality in Puerto Rico... Toa Baja Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 730 PM AST. * At 426 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. 1 to 4 inches of rain have fallen over the past few hours, and an additional 1 to 3 inches are possible. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja
